name: Friday Night: Horror House 3D
description:
You have to escape from the terrible man. He is chasing you.

Become the fear itself! You are really strong and fantastically horrifying mad maniac, but not all your ‘guests’ are that simple and inoffensive: some of them are really aggressive to you! Choose your prey wisely not to be dead! Kill them before the police come and become the most blood-thirsty and crazy maniac the world ever knew with Friday Night: Horror House 3D


Welcome to the worst nightmare of every human being – neglected country house, which actual host is the real mad maniac! Here you have a unique chance not to be a victim, but to be the maniac himself, so unleash your crazy fury and turn the life of these poor tourists into the hell before the police arrive! Hunt people and have fun playing Friday Night: Horror House 3D

Friday Night: Horror House 3D features:
Amazing killer simulator game
Lots of victims with various behavior
Classical horror survival game
Realistic 3D graphics
Ultimate mad maniac simulator game
Wide range of different rivals
Interesting types of weapons for more fun
